title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 212.6 - Decision and order
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 212.6 - Decision and order

State Regulations

Upon completion of a proceeding, the administrative law judge
shall issue a decision and order, ruling or report and recommendations as
appropriate to the proceeding. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4
ยง
212.6

Amended

New

York State Register August 2, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 31, eff. 8/2/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
